reviewText: Am very happy with my purchase got exactly what I wanted would recommend this seller to others buyers!!

The Best Of Taxi Cab Confessions highlights the best and most interesting footage of passengers in taxicabs in New York City.  Hidden cameras were placed in New York taxicabs to capture conversations taking place between the passengers and the cab driver.  You'll see and hear the weird, the bizarre, the unbelievable, and the most shocking confessions of ordinary New Yorkers.  I don't want to give away what these people talk about, but just be prepared for some true raw reality.  These taxicab conversations take place exclusively at night.  The passengers are on their way to everything from nightclubs to just going home for the night.  I think the fact that it's nighttime really makes people open up and say things they normally wouldn't say.  It's the state of mind people are in at night and especially when they're going out for a night on the town that makes them loosen up and start talking about crazy and bizarre things.

If you want to watch something that's different and raw cold reality, then see this video.  All of the segments are interesting.  Highly recommended.  This video is 50 minutes long and not rated.  I personally give it an R rating.
